posts.message:
Jobs: .NET software developer 

Diagnosoft for Healthcare  (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a software Engineer with the following specs:
B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or Engineering.
Minimum 2 years experience  in .Net Technologies with C# Language 
Good Experience in ASP.NET MVC , JQuery, AJAX, WCF
 Solid knowledge of OOP, UML, HTML, and XML
Knowledge of Agile development life cycles is a plus.
Experience with MS SQL databases and MS SQL scripting.
Knowledge of Team Foundation Server (TFS) is a plus.
Please send your resume to suha.maarouf@diagnosoft.com and write (SDTY) in the subject line of the email
posts.caption: www.diagnosoft.com
posts.description: Innovative software analysis tools for healthcare, including HARP®, the most accurate and reliable solution for measuring heart function using tagged MRI.

posts.message:
Jobs: Software C++ Developer

Diagnosoft for Healthcare  (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a software Engineer with the following specs:
B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or Engineering.
 from 0 to 2 years experience  in C++ Language 
 Solid knowledge of OOP, UML, and XML
Knowledge of Agile development life cycles is a plus.
Knowledge of Parallel programming is a plus
Please send your resume to suha.maarouf@diagnosoft.com and write (SDCOY) in the subject line of the email

posts.description: To many people, including Ron Owens, the word "some" refers to a relatively small amount in between "none" and "most". But To Ron's employer, and especially in the context of "job responsibly include... some maintenance of legacy VB6 applications", the word "some" tends to mean "pretty much all day…

posts.message: NDC is pretty much one of the most advanced (if not THE most advanced) world-class annual programming conferences with content focused mostly on .NET stuff (but not only). Now you can watch all the videos from NDC 2013 on https://vimeo.com/ndcoslo/videos

posts.caption: techcrunch.com
posts.description: At its Build developer conference today, Microsoft announced that it has added support for Bootstrap, the popular framework for responsive websites that was launched out of Twitter in 2011. Visual Studio 2013's project templates will use Bootstrap by default when you want to build a web app i..
